Text: Revised Contact Information for TeamAult As Great Game on Saturday Our next Game is Tuesday pm on Queenston Attached is the revised information for the entire team I know I just sent this out I also have the picture forms We will hand these out on Tuesday If you have not printed the snack schedule attached I will have a couple of extra copies at the game Additionally I have green belts for the uniforms Let me know if you need one I will bring them on Tuesday With so much going on on Saturday I did not have time to pass them out to new players on the team Tell your players that I was extremely please with how they played They were great sports See you on Tuesday John Snook AULT A fall ZIP

Revised Schedule Cc Attached is a revised schedule Please look at it carefully All remaining games are on Tuesday or Thursday for the remainder of the season Based upon this schedule I have tried to get Queenston for us to practice on every Saturday from to pm Also note that the game for tomorrow night has been changed from Queenston to Queenston There is a new faciltiy that was not on the original list West Little York If you do not know where this field is ask me or check out wwwcyfairsportscom Simplified directions are take east towards the beltway exit GessnerWest Little York turn on West Little york east goes over Stay on West little York past the st light and turn into the ball fields The Mustang Field will be straight ahead if you turn into the facility from West Little York There are set of fields The field we will play on does not have playground equipment next to the ball fields We have set a picture time I believe Amy Eagan has scheduled us for pm on Oct The pictures will be taken at the CyFair Fields I will bring a digital camera so parents can have a digital picture of their players See you tomorrow night at the ball fields John Snook Fall schedule Mustdoc
